document.full_text: last week's decision by the city university of new york board of trustees to withhold an honorary degree from the pulitzer prize-winning playwright tony kushner because of one trustee's concerns about mr. kushner's views about israel generated many comments on nytimes.com.
document.title: curtain down, heads up: readers respond to the kushner storm
lines_and_colors: last week's decision by the city university of new york board of trustees to withhold an honorary degree from the pulitzer prize-winning playwright tony kushner because of one trustee's concerns about mr. kushner's views about israel generated many comments on nytimes.com.
